llm_res.rule: transferFrom function should return true on success.

allowance function must return the remaining number of tokens that spender will be allowed to spend on behalf of owner through transferFrom. This value changes when approve or transferFrom are called.
llm_res.function: function allowance(address owner, address spender) public view virtual override returns (uint256)

llm_res.rule: transfer function must return a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
llm_res.function: function transfer(address recipient, uint256 amount) public virtual override returns (bool)

llm_res.rule: allowance function should return the remaining number of tokens that spender will be allowed to spend on behalf of owner through transferFrom. It should not return a modified value.
